segments.text: OK . Here's the final drawing ! It's for the trip !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the winner is ... Vivian , again ! I don't believe it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our red underwear didn't do any good at all !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are still some consolation prizes . We can go up to the front and pick them up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A lousy desk lamp . And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at Vivian ! She thinks she's the cat's meow !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you go talk to her and find out what her secret was this year .
segments.speaker: S1
